thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Rali

author: Rali
title: Rali
text: Happy with the lower flight prices but unhappy with the hidden cost! I got one price for the ticket but when I entered my credit card and confirmed I got charged Manulife full coverege insurance. I had already said no to insurance. It wasn't hard to get that cost off but it was a hassle. They have a 1-800 number and it was easy to get through. The lady that I talked to was very nice and fixed everything.
